column2: subobject level - a field in other objects

column1: The core describes the type of object, version, and how to validate it.  It also includes a unique ID field. All modules include a core.

column5: A name for the type of object/module. By convention also the file name (without dir or extension) of json schema or entity level metadata file
Version number in major.minor.patch format. Example 3.2.4.  Major version changes likely require change to software.  Patches are just documentation changes
URL of json schema document that validates this version of this module.
